description: 52-week content calendar for The TattooNOW Show — Season 1

weeks.episodeTitle: Why Your Website Is Losing You Clients
weeks.newsletterTopic: 5 things every tattoo website needs in 2026
weeks.meetingFocus: Website audit — review your own site live
weeks.keyPoints: Mobile-first design; 3-click booking rule; portfolio vs homepage; SEO basics for tattoo studios; Google Business Profile optimization

weeks.episodeTitle: You Don't Have a Business Plan (And That's Costing You)
weeks.newsletterTopic: The one-page business plan that actually works
weeks.meetingFocus: Fill out your one-page business plan together
weeks.keyPoints: Why most artists skip planning; one-page plan template; revenue targets vs goals; defining your ideal client; accountability partners

weeks.episodeTitle: Instagram Is Not a Marketing Strategy
weeks.newsletterTopic: The social media funnel: followers → bookings
weeks.meetingFocus: Audit your Instagram bio and link-in-bio setup
weeks.keyPoints: Platform diversification; owning your audience (email list); Instagram algorithm changes; converting followers to bookings; content batching

weeks.episodeTitle: Know Your Numbers or Lose Your Shop
weeks.newsletterTopic: The 3 numbers every tattoo artist must track
weeks.meetingFocus: Calculate your actual hourly rate
weeks.keyPoints: Cost per tattoo; overhead calculation; hourly rate math; profit margins; when to raise prices

weeks.episodeTitle: Google Reviews: Your Secret Weapon for Bookings

weeks.meetingFocus: Set up your review request system

weeks.episodeTitle: Pricing Your Flash Without Leaving Money on the Table

weeks.keyPoints: Size-based pricing; complexity multipliers; flash vs custom pricing psychology; market research; value-based pricing

weeks.episodeTitle: Email Marketing for Tattoo Artists (Yes, Really)

weeks.meetingFocus: Write your welcome email together

weeks.episodeTitle: Building Your Brand Beyond the Tattoo Chair
